transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan. Ji dada namaskar Prabhat baat kar raha hun India Mart se senior manager kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji main keh raha tha sir aapka profile chal raha tha Bengal Brass product ka isme sir aapka discussion hua tha usme kya issue aa raha hai sir abhi aapka discussion chal raha hai to aapka decide nahi hai sir aap kya dikkat aa rahi hai bataiye.
Customer: India Mart se bol rahe hain?
Executive: Ji ji dada bataiye main senior manager baat kar raha hun Prabhat Yadav senior manager India Mart se.
Customer: Jab mera sath baat chal raha tha aapki jaisa koi matlab aapka accountant manager haan haan ek wo mera tha wo 72000 jo humko diya tha main 23 saal mein uska 72000 payment kiya tha wo humko teen saal ka diya tha do saal hone ke baad bol raha hai haan haan teen saal tak hua nahi.
Customer: Kyun mang raha hai?
Executive: Ek ek second hold kijiyega aapka jo hai.
Customer: Kijiye.
Executive: Haan to teen saal ka ye tha aapka dikkat kahan par hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To teen saal aapka profile ho to gaya sir November aapne kiya tha ek minute hold kijiyega 72865 kiya tha na aapne?
Executive: Bengal Brass product se baat kar rahe hain na aap?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Invoice mein jaiye na invoice mein jaiye ek minute 28 November mein diya tha 2023 haan to 72862 humko teen saal ka tha to 23 abhi ho gaya 23 24 25 do saal ka hua hai.
Executive: Abhi aapka haan sir kuch confusion hui hogi aapka November 2023 mein aapka profile chal raha tha aapne teen saal ka pay kiya tha November 2026 tak aapka profile hai bilkul haan haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai isme koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: To wahi to humko aapka sab according jitna manager hai phone karta hai jaldi payment karo jaldi payment karo aapka do din hai ek din hai aisa aisa karta hai kyun aisa humko pareshani karta hai?
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Ek minute hold kijiyega sir main verify kar raha hun.
Customer: Isme jab tax invoice diya tha usme MBC 1 2 3 kuch likha nahi.
Customer: Aur aap logo ke sath main kitna saal 20 saal se juda hua hun.
Executive: Sir isme aapka profile se abhi aapko call aayega aapka wahi main bol raha hun kuch confusion hogi aapka teen saal ka hi profile hai November 26 aap jahan se pura likh dijiye bhai humko certificate dijiye teen saal ka hai itna tak hai humko system mein de dijiye aap aap bada sahab hai na system mein dijiye main usko dikha dunga teen saal hai jo aayega usko main dikha dunga.
Executive: Dekho November 23 se November 26 November 26 tak aapka profile chalega.
Customer: Abhi sir wo wo mera bas wo likh dijiye humko system mein likh dijiye itna tak hamara system chalega.
Executive: Theek hai sir abhi isme aisa karo na abhi aapko humne hum jo approach kar rahe hain abhi aapka sabse niche wala plan aapko approach nahi sunenge November ke baad 26 ke baad hum sunenge abhi kuch approach nahi sunenge main itna tak likh dijiye humko koi disturb mat kijiye main kam karne wala aadmi hun.
Executive: Chaliye koi baat nahi sir abhi services ke liye ek saal aapko kuch disturb mat kijiye.
Executive: Sir services ke liye call kar rahe hain hum aapko aur koi dikkat to nahi aa rahi na nahi nahi aur sara din mein teen char call karta hai ye ye log aur karna mat kijiye.
Executive: Feedback ke liye kar raha hoga ki feedback kya hai wo feedback ka nahi hai wo seedha to idhar aa jata hai wo aapko ye bata raha hun ye log agar baat aayega to aapka number personal number dijiye main usko bola bhai aapka naam bol dijiye uske sath baat kar lijiye aapka naam please boliye.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Aapka naam boliye.
Executive: Mera naam sir Prabhat hua.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Prabhat.
Customer: Prabhat aapka jo hai aap kaun sa matlab ye hai bol dijiye aapko kya bola aapko kya bola us lady ne aapko main shuru se bol raha hun aapka do saal ho gaya aapka khatam hone wala hai aapka payment bhejo hum kya payment bhejenge bhai teen saal to hua nahi abhi tak bolta hai na aapka to do saal ka hai.
Executive: Hmm. Nahi nahi sir aapka teen saal ka hai aapko confusion aapko to teen saal lekin aapka jitna account manager aata hai phone mein uska to number hum save nahi rakhte wo log bolta hai aap mera aap mera number save kar lo koi bhi call aayega to mere se baat kara dena wo confusion hui hogi 2026 tak aapka profile anishchit rahega theek hai.
Customer: Aapka number ye 080681217 haan main aapko personal number bhi apna whatsapp kar de raha hun usko bhi save kar lijiyega aap whatsapp kar dijiye aapka naam likh dijiye main aapke sath baat karne bolunga.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai dada aap mera number save kar lo senior manager aur sir ek satisfied ka click kar dena sir mere liye aap theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai ji theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states account managers call for payment.

- Wants written confirmation of subscription validity.

- States tax invoice lacks MBC 1 2 3.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed subscription valid until November 2026.

- Executive offered personal number for future contact.

- Executive requested a 'satisfied' click.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send personal number via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, payment, account manager, profile validity
